SEARCH
Package board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
board.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the main game board, containing an array of 40 tiles and methods to initialize, manage, and display the board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a Board object and initializes the tiles and card decks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Tile
    getTile(int position)
    Returns the tile at a given position.
    static int
    getTilePosition(String tileName)
    Returns the index of a tile based on its name.
    void
    initialise()
    Initializes all tiles on the board, including properties, stations, and special tiles like GO, Jail, Chance, etc.
    void
    printBoard()
    Renders a simple ASCII-style grid representation of the board in the console.
    void
    setTile(int position, Tile tile)
    Places a tile at a specified board position.

      public Tile getTile(int position)
      Returns the tile at a given position.
      Parameters:
      position - the index on the board
      Returns:

    • getTilePosition

      public static int getTilePosition(String tileName)
      Returns the index of a tile based on its name.
      Parameters:
      tileName - the name of the tile to find
      Returns:
      the index of the tile, or -1 if not found

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
